title: [Atoll, Ivory Path]
description: Several large ships split into multiple sections are crashed against a barely noticeable line of rocks in the water, alternating patches of dark blue and black water surrounding each jagged point.  The ivory path here is stained with an inky black substance.

Several large ships split into multiple sections are crashed against a barely visibly line of rocks in the water.  Alternating patches of dark blue and black waters surround each jagged point, and the ivory path below is stained with an inky black substance.
